tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    sensor_id INT,
    activity_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityEvents (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id UUID,
    sensor_id UUID,
    event_type STRING,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_description STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_devices (
    sensor_id UUID,
    sensor_type STRING,
    sensor_location STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE security_users (
    user_id UUID,
    user_name STRING,
    user_role STRING,
    user_email STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE door_sensor_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE window_sensor_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE alarm_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE log_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_id INT,
  event_time TIMESTAMP
);
